data.name: 0002 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And I also must defer to my bittersweet after school call

data.name: 0003 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Without even dedicating my sweaty youth to the ground with a white ball

data.name: 0004 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I head to the club room as I always do

data.name: 0006 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey

data.name: 0008 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Yuki

data.name: 0012 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Her eyes dropped back to the book in her hands

data.name: 0013 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just you today, is it?

data.name: 0016 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, what to do……

data.name: 0017 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Mikuru hasn't arrived yet, so I won't be drinking tea

data.name: 0019 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How should I put it? That sort of feels like taking away Mikuru's speciality

data.name: 0020 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In that case, how do I pass the time? Well……

data.name: 0021 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't have anyone to play a game with

data.name: 0023 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That being so, I think about reading a book, but……

data.name: 0024 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A young boy and a girl alone in a room silently reading books is questionable at best

data.name: 0025 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Shouldn't we be having a lively conversation, like healthy highschool students?

data.name: 0026 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Right, with that decided, I'll give it a go

data.name: 0027 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, Yuki

data.name: 0028 (356.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: What?

data.name: 0031 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, a lot happened, right? Things that you wouldn't forget

data.name: 0033 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is she thinking about it?

data.name: 0034 (356.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ……Not particularly

data.name: 0036 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: W-well, to each their own, I suppose

data.name: 0038 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's as uncooperative as ever

data.name: 0039 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You were a huge help at the summer camp

data.name: 0041 (356.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I just did what was necessary

data.name: 0042 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You say that, but all of us are deeply thankful

data.name: 0043 (356.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ……Is that so

data.name: 0044 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We went through a lot of stuff, but it was a very fulfilling summer holiday

data.name: 0045 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Honestly, it's not impossible that I'd say I had fun

data.name: 0047 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ……I wonder what Yuki thinks of it?

data.name: 0048 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Our alien, who ever since coming to this world

data.name: 0049 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Has spent most of her time alone in one room in an apartment

data.name: 0050 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How does she feel about a human, highschool firstyear's summer holiday?……

data.name: 0051 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Say, Yuki

data.name: 0054 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Did you enjoy the summer holiday?

data.name: 0055 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the first time, Yuki turned her head to me

data.name: 0059 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She gave a small nod

data.name: 0000 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was another day in the lingering summer heat

data.name: 0001 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When homeroom ended, it was Haruhi who left the classroom before anyone else

data.name: 0011 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As soon as I thought Yuki met eyes with me

data.name: 0015 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No response. Well, I wasn't expecting a reseponse in the first place I suppose

data.name: 0018 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course, I could brew some by myself, but

data.name: 0022 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, I could ask Yuki, but that honestly wouldn't even count as a game

data.name: 0029 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How was your summer holiday?

data.name: 0035 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The response of a good 10-20 seconds of careful consideration

data.name: 0040 (356.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If it weren't for Yuki, the world would be in a grave situation right now

data.name: 0046 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Because that was the first time in my life I had such an absurd summer

data.name: 0053 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As always, her gaze remained on the book

data.name: 0057 (356.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Then, after staring at me for a while——

data.name: 0060 (356.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: テスト選択肢
